title: How to delete all downloaded Spotify songs - Quora

response.answer_text: The same way you delete anything. High light the list and press delete on the keyboard or the red X above. or right click and select delete. Crtl A will highlight the entire list of files in a foler. Then press delete and they’re all gone. If you want to delete everything, right click the folder and delete everything it in at once. It’s against the rules to download Spotify music. You may just have a playlist that is a link to the songs. If the music is on your computer, then it will be a bunch of large audio files. When you click on one, does it play in a player or does it take you to a playlist that Spotify streams to you?
